subject: Dear
body:
Dear
Are you dead? Because the report I am getting from the bank is that
someone wrote to them that you're dead, that he's your next of kin,
that he wants to claim your fund as your next of kin. So they
contacted me to be sure before proceeding with him, so please confirm
to me before it will be too late. I am waiting for your urgent
response from the receipt of this mail
Regard
David Gate

subject: Re: Dear
body:
Hello David Gate,

Oh my, that's quite a surprise! I can assure you that I am very much alive and well. It's strange to hear about someone claiming to be my next of kin. Could you please tell me more about this person? How did they prove their relation to me?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Michelle

subject: Re: Dear
body:
Dear Michelle,
Its not an easy thing, one young Mr. Dawn, came to the office of the Security company in Amsterdam, Netherlands, where your $100 million is been kept and said that is your next of kin, that they should allow him to claim your fund on your behalf that you sent him to claim the fund. So i decided to contact you to hear from you before security company will proceed with him, now that we know that you're not the one that sent him, i will tell the security company to get him arrest, so as its now i urge you to act fast and claim your fund before it will be too late

I am waiting for your urgent positive response from the receipt of this mail for more details
Regard
David Gate
